alert.note: Alert for Northern Wayne; Susquehanna (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 9:18PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Susquehanna and northwestern Wayne Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 918 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hallstead, or 8 miles northeast of Montrose, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Susquehanna, Susquehanna Depot, Hallstead, New Milford, Great Bend, Ararat, Lanesboro, Thompson and Starrucca. This includes the following highway exits... Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 219 and 230. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
